data.name: Life is Strange™ - Directors' Commentary
data.detailed_description:
An exclusive behind the scenes interview with the team at DONTNOD as they discuss the inspirations and challenges they faced when creating the critically acclaimed and award winning Life is Strange. No fan will want to miss this.

Clicking Download will add a DLC to the Life is Strange game which you can then optionally install to watch the videos inside the game. The set of videos will also be added to your Steam Video Library where you can stream them at any time.

Life Is Strange is a five part episodic game that sets out to revolutionise story based choice and consequence games.

Key Features
  • A beautifully written modern adventure game
  • Rewind time to change the course of events
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices you make
  • Striking, hand-painted visuals
  • Distinct, licensed indie soundtrack featuring alt-J, Foals, José González & more...

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimalne:
  • System operacyjny: Windows Vista
  • Procesor: Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Pamięć: 2 GB RAM
  • Karta graficzna: ATI or NVidia card w/ 512 MB RAM (not recommended for Intel HD Graphics cards)
  • Miejsce na dysku: 8 GB dostępnej przestrzeni
  • Dodatkowe uwagi: DirectX®: 9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Zalecane:
  • System operacyjny: Windows 7
  • Procesor: Dual Core 3.0GHz or equivalent
  • Pamięć: 2 GB RAM
  • Karta graficzna: ATI or NVidia card w/ 1024 MB RAM (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or ATI HD 4890)
  • Miejsce na dysku: 8 GB dostępnej przestrzeni
  • Dodatkowe uwagi: DirectX®: 9

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimalne:
  • Dodatkowe uwagi: Additional 4GB required for commentary
mac_requirements.recommended:
Zalecane:
  • Dodatkowe uwagi: Additional 4GB required for commentary

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimalne:
  • Dodatkowe uwagi: Additional 4GB required for commentary
linux_requirements.recommended:
Zalecane:
  • Dodatkowe uwagi: Additional 4GB required for commentary
